name: <io::buffered::linewritershim::LineWriterShim<'a, W> as io::Write>::is_write_vectored

io::buffered::linewritershim::LineWriter.doc:
Gets a reference to the inner writer (that is, the writer
 wrapped by the BufWriter).

io::Write::is_write_vectored.doc:
Determines if this `Write`r has an efficient [`write_vectored`]
 implementation.

 If a `Write`r does not override the default [`write_vectored`]
 implementation, code using it may want to avoid the method all together
 and coalesce writes into a single buffer for higher performance.

 The default implementation returns `false`.

 [`write_vectored`]: Write::write_vectored
